revised_title: A New and Safe Crane with Four Different Powers
tldr: James Ferguson invents a new and safe crane with four different powers to prevent accidents and improve efficiency in lifting heavy weights. The crane features a horizontal wheel with an upright axle, three trundles with different numbers of staves, and a winch for turning the trundles. The design allows for different power levels depending on the weight being lifted, ensuring a safer and more efficient lifting experience.
